ingredients.item: Fry Light sunfl ower oil spray
Bunch of salad onions, thinly sliced
4 tbsp sweet chilli sauce, to serve

instructions.step: Cook the noodles and tofu together in a large pan of simmering water for 5 minutes until tender, then drain well.

Spritz a non-stick wok with sunflower oil spray, then heat for a minute. Add the vegetables and onions and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, then add the noodles, tofu, teriyaki sauce and sesame seeds and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
